name: Hairy Face Salon - Hair dresser and hair stylist salon game
name_original: Hairy Face Salon - Hair dresser and hair stylist salon game
description:
Hairy Face Salon is a new fashion and makeover game for kids and girls. There are different baby characters having excessive hair on their faces and need your help to get tidy. Help the baby characters in removing the hair form their faces using different tools and to make them look good and smart. Isn’t it exciting? So download it now for free and enjoy!!

HOW TO PLAY:
======================
•Select the character of your choice
•Use the tools to remove the extra hair
•Help them get tidy and clean using various other tools like (tweezer, hair brush, tooth brush and wax etc.)
•Apply the same to all the characters one by one

FEATURES:
======================
•Easy tap and drag game play.
•Kids friendly content
•No violence, horror, sex or nudity
•Backgrounds and wallpaper personalization
•Sharing on Facebook with friends & family
•No monsters, dragons, aliens or clans
•No hospitals, doctors, dentists or sickness
•Suitable for the whole family
•Cool BG music and HD graphics
